name: Jimmy Vs. Robots
description:
Meet Jimmy: A sad, tired young man who has been drained by the stress of modern-day technology and social media. One day, the robot apocalypse occurs, and Jimmy is forced to fight for his life. But, he notices that he has discovered a new purpose in life: blowing up robots. It's a catharsis he wished he had many years ago. Now, Jimmy is bent on destroying every last robot remaining. Will you survive?

Comment below what your highest score is!

DISCLAIMER: This game is not very good. It's my first game, and I tried my best to make it as good as possible, but it's got a lot of things to work on (and I will) so bare with me

EVERY SINGLE ASSET, SOUND, AND MUSIC WAS MADE BY ME. GAME WAS MADE USING GODOT ENGINE
